name: Oh @#*&, We Gave a Dinosaur a Claw (What the $&@# are We Supposed to do Now?)
name_original: Oh @#*&, We Gave a Dinosaur a Claw (What the $&@# are We Supposed to do Now?)
description:
It is the future, the year XXXX. Human civilisation has advanced beyond anything you or I could imagine. Human beings have become completely scientific beings, they have pillaged nearly every resource available to them and have transcended their bodily forms to become something completely unrecognisable.

But for this story, only two of humanities inventions are of concern: the revival of dinosaurs from trace DNA, and big-ass robotic claws. Of course, it didn't take long for humanity to decide to combine these two inventions, and (of course) it didn't take long for it to go very wrong...
